      Creates a new (unpersisted) work item in given project.
      IWorkItem IDocumentsManager.createWorkItem(IProject project, ILocation location)
      Deprecated. 
      Creates an instance of work item, which (after being persistent) will be stored in document on given location.
      IWorkItem IModuleManager.createWorkItem(IProject project, ILocation location)
      Creates an instance of work item, which (after being persistent) will be stored in module on given location.
      IWorkItem ITrackerService.findWorkItem(java.lang.String projectId, java.lang.String id)
      Finds work item, differs from ITrackerService.getWorkItem(String, String) in smarter handling of the id parameter.
      IWorkItem ITrackerService.getWorkItem(java.lang.String projectId, java.lang.String workItemId)
      This is a shortcut method for getTrackerProject(projectId).getWorkItem(workItemId), see ITrackerProject.getWorkItem(String).

      java.util.LinkedHashSet<IWorkItem> IPlan.getItems()
      The returned set does not contain null values.
      java.util.List<IWorkItem> IPlan.getOrderedItems()
      Returns child items from persisted object in the order that respects IPlan.getPrioritizationField()
      java.util.LinkedHashSet<IWorkItem> IPlan.getResolvableItems()
      Returns items from the plan that are still exist.
      java.util.List<IWorkItem> IModule.getUnreferencedWorkItems()
      Returns unreferenced work items contained in this module(even module is from specific revision).
      java.util.Set<IWorkItem> IModule.IMoveReport.skippedChildWorkItems()
      Used only in moveId, it is a collection of child work items which were not in the input collection and should be moved, but cannot because they are in LiveDoc.
      java.util.Set<IWorkItem> IModule.IMoveReport.skippedWorkItems()
      Set of skipped work items from the input collection.
